statements: SELECT * FROM vaccines WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer FROM vaccines WHERE expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT vaccine_id, vaccine_name, quantity FROM vaccines ORDER BY vaccine_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vaccines WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' AND quantity > 50;
SELECT vaccine_name, expiration_date FROM vaccines WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vaccines WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer, quantity FROM vaccines WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY vaccine_name ASC;
SELECT vaccine_name, quantity, manufacturer FROM vaccines WHERE manufacturer = 'Moderna' OR manufacturer = 'AstraZeneca' ORDER BY vaccine_id;
SELECT * FROM vaccines WHERE quantity < 50 AND (manufacturer = 'Johnson & Johnson' OR expiration_date < '2023-06-30') ORDER BY quantity ASC, expiration_date DESC;
SELECT vaccine_id, manufacturer FROM vaccines WHERE vaccine_name LIKE '%Flu%' ORDER BY manufacturer DESC, vaccine_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vaccine_inventory;
SELECT vaccine_name, quantity FROM vaccine_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT patient_id, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC;
SELECT vaccine_name, quantity FROM vaccine_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT vaccine_name, quantity, vaccination_date FROM vaccine_inventory JOIN vaccination_records ON vaccine_inventory.vaccine_id = vaccination_records.vaccine_id;
SELECT vaccine_name, quantity FROM vaccine_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_records WHERE vaccination_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, vaccine_id FROM vaccination_records ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT vaccine_name, quantity FROM vaccine_inventory WHERE vaccine_name LIKE '%Pfizer%';
SELECT v.quantity, vr.vaccination_date FROM vaccine_inventory v INNER JOIN vaccination_records vr ON v.vaccine_id = vr.vaccine_id;
SELECT * FROM VaccineInventory;
SELECT vaccine_name, quantity FROM VaccineInventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT expiration_date, vaccine_name FROM VaccineInventory WHERE expiration_date >= CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM VaccinationSites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT site_name, location, phone_number FROM VaccinationSites WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM VaccineInventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, location, phone_number FROM VaccinationSites WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, vaccination_date FROM VaccinationRecords WHERE vaccination_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT vaccine_name, quantity FROM VaccineInventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM VaccinationSites WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vaccine;
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM Vaccine ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, dose_count FROM Vaccine WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date <= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT Patient.name, Patient.age, Administered.administration_date FROM Patient INNER JOIN Administered ON Patient.id = Administered.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Vaccine ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM Vaccine WHERE dose_count > 1;
SELECT id, manufacturer, dose_count FROM Vaccine WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT Patient.name, Patient.age, Administered.administration_date FROM Patient JOIN Administered ON Patient.id = Administered.patient_id;
SELECT Inventory.vaccine_id, Inventory.quantity, Vaccine.name FROM Inventory JOIN Vaccine ON Inventory.vaccine_id = Vaccine.id WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM vaccine_centers;
SELECT center_id, center_name, location FROM vaccine_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer, dosage_amount FROM vaccines WHERE dosage_amount > 1;
SELECT * FROM vaccine_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY center_id;
SELECT vaccination_date, recipient_name FROM vaccine_administration ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vaccine_centers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer, dosage_amount FROM vaccines WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' AND dosage_amount >= 2;

SELECT cent.center_name, vac.vaccine_name, vac.manufacturer FROM vaccine_centers AS cent JOIN vaccine_inventory AS inv ON cent.center_id = inv.center_id JOIN vaccines AS vac ON inv.vaccine_id = vac.vaccine_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vaccines, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM vaccine_inventory;
SELECT w.worker_name, w.role, c.center_name FROM healthcare_workers AS w JOIN vaccine_centers AS c ON w.center_id = c.center_id WHERE w.role = 'Nurse';
